definitions.definition: a group of three people or things

examples.text: A trio of English runners featured in the women’s 1 500 metres.

definitions.definition: a group of three musicians or singers who play or sing together

examples.text: The trio is/are performing at the jazz festival.

definitions.definition: a piece of music for three musicians or singers

examples.text: a trio for piano, oboe and bassoon

wordOrigin: early 18th cent.: from Italian, from Latin tres ‘three’, on the pattern of duo.
